metadata.title: MBI Subsidiaries | The Network
metadata.description: Explore the companies powering the MBI ecosystem: Aforevo, Vybz 94.5 FM, Revo+, and our specialized production divisions.

hero.heading: THE MBI SUBSIDIARIES
hero.subheading: A conglomerate of specialized divisions driving African entertainment.

brands.name: Aforevo
brands.description: The flagship digital platform aggregating African movies and content. Home to the Aforevo YouTube network and Aforevo Facebook community.

brands.name: Vybz 94.5 FM
brands.description: More than just radio. Vybz 94.5 FM is the pulse of Afrobeatz culture, broadcasting live music, news, and entertainment to a global audience.

brands.name: Revo+
brands.description: Our 24/7 linear TV channel dedicated to fashion, urban culture, and celebrity lifestyle. Available on StarTimes and FreeTV.

brands.name: Aforevo MCN
brands.description: Africa's largest YouTube Multi-Channel Network. We protect, monetize, and grow channels for hundreds of creators.

brands.name: Aforevo Dubbing
brands.description: State-of-the-art localization studios translating Nollywood content into French, Swahili, and Spanish for broader reach.

brands.name: MBI Production
brands.description: The creative engine behind our original series, music videos, and feature films. From concept to 4K delivery.

brands.name: Aforevo Events
brands.description: Curating concerts, award shows, and fan festivals that bring the digital community into the physical world.

brands.name: MBI Distribution
brands.description: Strategic placement of content across DSPs, VOD platforms, and airlines. We get African stories to every screen.

brands.name: MBI Networks
brands.description: The backbone of our digital operations, handling ISP services and technical connectivity.
